ivory.core.data.index
Class PostingsListDocSortedNonPositional

java.lang.Object
  ivory.core.data.index.PostingsListDocSortedNonPositional
All Implemented Interfaces:
PostingsList, Writable
public class PostingsListDocSortedNonPositional
extends Object
implements PostingsList

Object representing a document-sorted postings list wit no positional information.

Author:
Jimmy Lin

getCf

public long getCf()
Description copied from interface: PostingsList
Returns the collection frequency of the term associated with this postings list. This method is not meaningful for impact-sorted indexes.

Specified by:

getDf

public int getDf()
Description copied from interface: PostingsList
Returns the document frequency of the term associated with this postings list. Note this is may be different from PostingsList.getNumberOfPostings() because of document partitioning for large collections. In these cases, this method should return the global document frequency, whereas PostingsList.getNumberOfPostings() should return the document frequency in this partition. In a collection with only a single partition, this is exactly the same value as PostingsList.getNumberOfPostings(). This method is not meaningful for impact-sorted indexes.

Specified by:
getDf in interface PostingsList

getNumberOfPostings

public int getNumberOfPostings()
Description copied from interface: PostingsList
Returns the number of postings that will be added to this list. That is, this method returns the value set by PostingsList.setNumberOfPostings(int). Note that under most circumstances this method will return a different value than PostingsList.size(), which returns the number of postings that have already been added.

Specified by:
getNumberOfPostings in interface PostingsList

setCollectionDocumentCount

public void setCollectionDocumentCount(int docs)
Description copied from interface: PostingsList
Sets the number of documents in this collection. This value is necessary for certain encoding schemes (e.g., Golomb encoding). This method is typically called before postings are adding to the postings list.

Specified by:
setCollectionDocumentCount in interface PostingsList

setDf

public void setDf(int df)
Specified by:
setDf in interface PostingsList

setNumberOfPostings

public void setNumberOfPostings(int n)
Description copied from interface: PostingsList
Sets the number of postings that will be added to this list. For certain encoding schemes (e.g., Golomb encoding), this value is required before any postings are added.

Specified by:
setNumberOfPostings in interface PostingsList

size

public int size()
Description copied from interface: PostingsList
Returns the number of postings that have been added to this postings list. Note that under most circumstances this method will return a different value than PostingsList.getNumberOfPostings(), which returns the number of postings that will eventually be added (required for certain encoding schemes).

Specified by:
size in interface PostingsList
